references: Related: CF 261946, Ord 89363, Ord 90063, Ord 90876, Ord 96327
summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the City's sewage and disposal agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle authorized by Ordinance 89363 as amended, to authorize the payment to The City of Seattle of the maximum sum of $6,000,000 in aid of separation of combined sewers tributary to Lake Washington in lieu of construction of holding tanks and extending the term of such agreement to 2016.
